mapper.select: SELECT a.dt AS year , NVL(SUM(b.pay_price), 0) AS annual_sales, NVL(COUNT(b.pay_price), 0) AS annual_sales_cnt FROM (SELECT LEVEL AS dt FROM dual WHERE LEVEL > TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY'))-10 CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'))) a, (SELECT TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY') AS year , pay_price FROM orders WHERE TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -108), 'YYYY') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) b WHERE a.dt = b.year(+) GROUP BY a.dt ORDER BY a.dt

SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -108), 'YYYY') || ' ~ ' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AS ten_years, SUM(annual_sales) AS annual_sales_total, SUM(annual_sales_cnt) AS annual_sales_cnt_total FROM (SELECT a.dt AS year , NVL(SUM(b.pay_price), 0) AS annual_sales, NVL(COUNT(b.pay_price), 0) AS annual_sales_cnt FROM (SELECT LEVEL AS dt FROM dual WHERE LEVEL > TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY'))-10 CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'))) a, (SELECT TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY') AS year , pay_price FROM orders WHERE TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -108), 'YYYY') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) b WHERE a.dt = b.year(+) GROUP BY a.dt ORDER BY a.dt)
